message: I propose we split the money evenly. A fair deal for both of us, don't you think?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you agree?
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise, but this needs to be somewhat fair.
I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere fast. I'm increasing my offer again in the spirit of compromise. Let's get this done.
I see you're willing to move, so I'll meet you a bit closer, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm raising my offer again, but this is the last time.  Take it or leave it.
You said that was your last offer, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. Don't let pride get in the way of a good deal.
